no_cities_for_cp: No cities found for the postal code.
catalog_doesnt_allow_creation: The catalog does not allow creating the destination.
catalog_doesnt_allow_delete: The catalog does not allow deleting the destination.
catalog_doesnt_allow_edition: The catalog does not allow editing the destination.
catalog_doesnt_allow_favourite: The catalog does not allow selecting the destination as a favorite.
country_doesnt_allow_creation: The country is not configured for destination creation.
cannot_delete: The address cannot be deleted as it has associated orders.
